abstract.locale: The 'foreignObject' element allows for inclusion of a foreign namespace which has its graphical content drawn by a different user agent.

description.locale: The x-axis coordinate of one corner of the rectangular region into which the referenced document is placed.
The y-axis coordinate of one corner of the rectangular region into which the referenced document is placed.
The width of the rectangular region into which the referenced document is placed.
The height of the rectangular region into which the referenced document is placed.

value.name: matrix(a b c d e f)

description.locale: Specifies transformation matrix [a b c d e f]
Specifies a translation by tx and ty.
Specifies a scale operation by sx and sy.
Specifies a rotation by rotate-angle degrees about a given point.
Specifies a skew transformation along the x-axis.
Specifies a skew transformation along the y-axis.
This attribute specifies a list of coordinate system transformations to apply to the element it appears on. The individual transform definitions are separated by white space and/or a comma.
